text: By Bang The 34 - year - old reality TV star was recently spotted supporting the NBA player at a basketball game in Cleveland, but the'Revenge Body'host - who has six - month - old daughter True with Tristan - still isn't sure how long she wants to stay in the city with the sports star or whether she thinks her long - term future remains in Los Angeles. A source told'Entertainment Tonight': ` ` Khloe and Tristan are still working on things, but know whatever they decide to do moving forward, it will be whatever is best for their daughter, True. ` ` Khloe isn't certain how long she will be in Cleveland and may fly back for her mom, Kris Jenner's, birthday next week, but isn't sure.
